text: Judaba uaghan Hamanɨn otarir 10pla bar me mɨsoghezɨ me ariaghire. Haman a Judabar apanim gamir gumazim, a Hamedatan otarim. An otaribar ziabar kara: Parsandata ko, Dalfon, Aspata, Porata, Adalia, Aridata, Parmasta, Arisai, Aridai ko, Vaisata. Me ariaghirezɨma, Judaba men bizitam okemezir puvatɨ.
